Room.Name: Tranquility Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Tranquility Way, south of the Military Headquarters.
Room.LongDescription: The great Oceancrest Military Headquarters is located on the north side of the road, and covers much of the northeastern section of town. The City of Oceancrest is very proud of their military might, which is about the only way to keep the barbarian cultures outside the city at bay.
